message: Let's be fair and split close to 50/50, but I get slightly more for going first.  It's in our best interest to settle now before inflation eats our money!
Since we lost 5% of the value in the first round, I think I should get a bit more now. Plus, I'm giving you the chance to stop the inflation here.
Bob, let's stop wasting time and split this evenly.  Another round and we both lose more to inflation!
